title: Cheesy Bacon Muffins
ingredients: ['6 thick rashers streaky bacon', '250g plain flour', '1 1/2 tablespoons caster sugar', '2 teaspoons baking powder', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '1 1/2 teaspoons garlic granules', '4 teaspoons dried chives', '25g grated Parmesan cheese', '140g grated mature Cheddar cheese', '1 egg, beaten', '125ml milk', '125ml cream of mushroom soup', '125ml vegetable oil']
